windows.changelog:
A new release is here with some major bug fixes and improvements.

Bug fixes and improvements:

  • Faster Note Loading: Improved the speed of loading notes, now 35% faster than the previous version.
  • Resolved a memory leak issue.

Join our Discord for discussions, and feel free to email us. We love hearing from our users.

We have a lot more to show, so stay tuned.
